hero.subtitle: AI-powered platform for live stream sellers. Import your live video URL, let AI extract customer orders from comments, and manage everything in one place.
hero.tagline: Save hours of manual work every single day

features.title: Why Choose Soclix?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage live stream sales efficiently

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Extraction
aiPowered.description: Our AI automatically identifies and extracts customer orders from live stream comments.

saveHours.title: Save Hours Daily
saveHours.description: Stop manually scrolling through thousands of comments. Let automation do the work.

realTime.title: Real-Time Processing
realTime.description: Comments are processed as they come in, giving you instant order visibility.

analytics.title: Smart Analytics
analytics.description: Track your sales performance with detailed insights and reporting.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to automate your live stream sales

step1.title: Paste URL
step1.description: Copy your live stream video URL and paste it into Soclix

step2.title: AI Extracts
step2.description: Our AI scans all comments and identifies customer orders

step3.title: Manage & Export
step3.description: Review orders, manage customers, and export to Excel

cta.title: Ready to streamline your sales?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of live stream sellers who save hours every day

streams.title: My Streams

streams.addFirst: Add your first stream to get started
streams.clickToView: Click on a stream to view its orders
streams.noOrders: No orders found for this stream
streams.urlHelp: Paste the URL of your Facebook, Instagram, or TikTok live stream video.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for your business. All plans include a 14-day free trial.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Soclix supports Facebook Live, Instagram Live, and TikTok Live. YouTube Live support coming soon.
faq.q2: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a2: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time without any fees. Your account will remain active until the end of the billing period.
faq.q3: How accurate is the AI extraction?
faq.a3: Our AI model achieves over 95% accuracy in identifying orders from comments. We continuously improve the algorithm based on feedback.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.quickResponseDesc: Our team typically responds within 2-4 hours during business days.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...
contact.thankYou: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you soon.

modal.title: Scan Configuration
modal.description: Enter known product codes, colors and sizes for more accurate order recognition
modal.aiHelperDesc: Specify all product codes, colors and sizes used in your store. This will help the system more accurately identify orders from comments.
modal.tableDesc: Add product codes and specify available colors and sizes for each code separately.
